actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend section 203(e) of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970, that for any portion of the period between October 27, 1972, and March 31, 1975, a State may continue to pay extended benefits without regard to provisions in the Act relating to the State "off" and "on" indicators. (Amends P.L. 92-599)

titles.title: To amend section 203(e) of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970.
